Business Name
Business Website
Your Name
Your Mobile Number (The number should not be associated with any other WhatsApp Account)
Work Email

Information needed:
â€¢ Company Website (must match the information provided in the Business Manager)
â€¢ Company Facebook Page
â€¢ The phone number(s) you want to apply
â€¢ Facebook Business Manager ID where the WhatsApp Business API account is registered
â€¢ If the business is known under any other name, please provide those names
â€¢ If the business name is in a language other than English, please provide their business name in the source language
â€¢ Short description of the company's products and services, market reach, revenue and client base. This information is purely to demonstrate to WhatsApp that the company is a well known global brand. The more detail you give, the better chance of approval.
â€¢ Please share at least 5 links of media coverage about the company (articles in newspapers, websites, magazines, etc. Needs to be from well-recognized media sources, blog posts from small websites or from your companyâ€™s website will not be accepted. Social media pages and paid promotion content are also invalid)
Important notes:
The display name currently approved to the account will be the one with the OBA and cannot be changed. Please double check if it is correct and if needed, request a display name update before filing the OBA request.
Please note that 360dialog cannot guarantee that any account will be promoted to an Official Business Account. The review process is conducted by the WhatsApp API Support Team and can take up to 7 days.
If your application is successful, the account will be upgraded automatically so there will be no further action required
